bitter tea

The game for Unit Testing

How it Works

Simply put the function to test in the box labeled function, and then create the test parameters in the Unit Test area. You can run as many tests as you like for each function. Every time that your expected output matches the actual output you gain a point, but when it doesn't match you lose one.
